title: DiceFace
author: DiceFace
content: The Account is level 2 verified and will always be eligible for bonuses.Currently sitting at 42% progression to Plat 4 (which will give you 9,600$ as a level up bonus).Account comes with original creation e-mail address and every other detail is inside e-mail inbox.Wagered so far are 1.9 Million USDWith 0 wager you currently get:Pre + Post Monthly: 25$ eachMonthly: 20$Weekly: 10$Wagering some money drastically increases the Monthly and Weekly bonuses.All bonuses together during month will probably amount to $100 easily without any deposition/gameplay. Direct Contact at: DoubleDices#4802 BTC

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: DiceFace on July 10, 2023, 11:08:41 AMThe Account is level 2 verified and will always be eligible for bonuses.Currently sitting at 42% progression to Plat 4 (which will give you 9,600$ as a level up bonus).Account comes with original creation e-mail address and every other detail is inside e-mail inbox.Wagered so far are 1.9 Million USDWith 0 wager you currently get:Pre + Post Monthly: 25$ eachMonthly: 20$Weekly: 10$Wagering some money drastically increases the Monthly and Weekly bonuses.All bonuses together during month will probably amount to $100 easily without any deposition/gameplay. Direct Contact at: DoubleDices#4802 BTCFor any reason if they ask to verify then will you provide a KYC document? And if they are required to verify via video call then will you be able to verify that? If yes and there is 5000$ on the account then will the buyer get back the account or you will take that? How to rely on you? Also, is it too hard to recover the account after changing the hand it is too easy as the country/city will not be the same as you.
